sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_sec_cmn_src_cmdb_map"> <sn_sec_cmn_src_cmdb_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <order>200</order> <script><![CDATA[/************************ * Name Extraction Script * * Input/Output variables: * - value: Input variable for evaluate script * - answer: Output variable from script * Extract name from variable 'value' and assign to variable 'answer' * *--------Sample code----- answer = value; if (!gs.nil(value)) { var indexOfSeparator = value.indexOf("\\"); if (indexOfSeparator) answer = value.substring(indexOfSeparator + 1); } ************************/ answer = value; ]]></script> <source display_value="CyCognito Vulnerability Response Integration">b65337fe87cb8d10c529da483cbb35a4</source> <source_field>ID</source_field> <sys_created_by>tap-crestds</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-04 13:13:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_id>e22598c9871f0550c529da483cbb35d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>tap-crestds</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 13:37:18</sys_updated_on> <target_field>name</target_field> <target_table>sn_sec_cmn_unmatched_ci</target_table> <use_script>false</use_script> </sn_sec_cmn_src_cmdb_map> </record_update>
